thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-UAE's Invest Bank Posts FY Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UAE's Invest Bank Posts FY Loss
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - INVEST BANK:
* FY LOSS ‍​277.7 MILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS PROFIT OF 271.7 MILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* FY NET INTEREST INCOME 534.3 MILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 511.1 MILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* AS AT END DEC, CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 13.59 BILLION DIRHAMS UP 12 PERCENT YEAR ON YEAR
* AS AT END DEC, LOANS AND ADVANCES STAND AT 12.47 BILLION DIRHAMS UP 4 PERCENT YEAR ON YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
